name: unexpected-resemble
description: Resemble.js plugin for the Unexpected assertion library

scripts.travis: npm test && npm run coverage && <coverage/lcov.info coveralls
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development istanbul cover _mocha -- --reporter dot && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.prepublish: browserify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -i canvas -e lib/unexpectedResemble -s unexpectedResemble > unexpectedResemble.min.js
scripts.generate-site: node ./generate-site.js && cp -R testdata site-build/assertions/any/to-resemble/ && cp -R testdata site-build/

author: Andreas Lind <andreas@one.com>
